Class TicketDAO

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.persistence.TicketDAO
public class TicketDAO extends Object
The TicketDAO class provides data access methods for managing ticket data. It handles operations such as adding, listing, finding, canceling, and reactivating tickets stored in a JSON file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TicketDAO()
    Constructs a TicketDAO instance, initializing the data access object with the specified file path and type for ticket lists.

    • TicketDAO

      public TicketDAO()
      Constructs a TicketDAO instance, initializing the data access object with the specified file path and type for ticket lists.

  • Method Details

    • addTicket

      public boolean addTicket(Ticket ticket)
      Adds a new ticket to the ticket list.
      Parameters:
      ticket - The ticket to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the ticket was added successfully.

    • listTickets

      public List<Ticket> listTickets()
      Retrieves all tickets from the ticket list.
      Returns:
      A list of all tickets, or an empty list if no tickets are found.

    • findTicketByEventAndSeat

      public Ticket findTicketByEventAndSeat(Event event, String seat)
      Finds a ticket by its associated event and seat number.
      Parameters:
      event - The event associated with the ticket.
      seat - The seat number of the ticket.
      Returns:
      The Ticket object if found, or null if not found.

    • cancelTicket

      public boolean cancelTicket(Ticket ticket)
      Cancels a specified ticket.
      Parameters:
      ticket - The ticket to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the ticket was canceled successfully, false otherwise.

    • reactivateTicket

      public boolean reactivateTicket(Ticket ticket)
      Reactivates a previously canceled ticket.
      Parameters:
      ticket - The ticket to be reactivated.
      Returns:
      true if the ticket was reactivated successfully, false otherwise.
